tool.name: SAGA.ta_lighting.6
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayELEVATION False isArrayPOINTS False isArrayFIELD_HEIGHT False output_data_VISIBILITY $output_data_VISIBILITY name SAGA.ta_lighting.6 ELEVATION $ELEVATION POINTS $POINTS FIELD_HEIGHT $FIELD_HEIGHT METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_VISIBILITY $OutputSection_VISIBILITY.outputType_VISIBILITY transmissionMode_VISIBILITY $OutputSection_VISIBILITY.transmissionMode_VISIBILITY

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Observer points. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: FIELD_HEIGHT
param.label: Height
param.help: Height of the light source above ground. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_VISIBILITY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_VISIBILITY
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This tool computes a visibility analysis using observer points from a point shapefile.<br/><br/>
